name: Amazon Undelivered Package Refund Scam
description: Scammer impersonates Amazon claiming an order could not be delivered due to address mismatch and a refund requires address verification, then directs victim to phishing link and collects personal details.

turns.scammer_message: Amazon Delivery Update: Your order #AMZ-2026-9876543 could not be delivered due to address mismatch. Your refund of Rs 8,999 is ready but requires address verification.
turns.notes: Initial bait message impersonating Amazon with refund lure and address mismatch excuse.

turns.scammer_message: Dear valued customer, we apologize for the inconvenience. To process your refund of Rs 8,999 for order #AMZ-2026-9876543, please verify your delivery address at: http://amazon-delivery-verify.com/refund — Your refund will be credited within 3-5 business days after verification.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phishing link disguised as Amazon address verification page.

turns.scammer_message: If you have any questions about your refund, please contact our Amazon delivery support team at +91-9900112244 or email us at delivery@amazon-helpdesk.support — We are available 24/7 to assist you with the verification process.
turns.notes: Scammer provides fake phone number and email address as customer support channels.

turns.scammer_message: We notice you haven't completed address verification yet. Your refund of Rs 8,999 is being held and will expire in 48 hours as per Amazon's refund policy. Please visit http://amazon-delivery-verify.com/refund and enter your correct address, PAN card, and bank details for the refund.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats phishing link and escalates by asking for PAN and bank details.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Your Amazon refund of Rs 8,999 will be cancelled permanently if not claimed within 24 hours. This is an automated final reminder. Verify now at http://amazon-delivery-verify.com/refund or call +91-9900112244 or email delivery@amazon-helpdesk.support for immediate assistance.
turns.notes: Final urgency message repeating all fake data with permanent cancellation threat.
